summary: This mod increases the amount of gold all merchants have in the game.
descriptionHtml:
This mod increases the amount of gold all merchants have in the game.

There are 2 versions of this mod to choose from. Only install one version!

[list][*][b]Rich Merchants[/b]
Changes most merchants to have 10,000 gold instead of 750.

[*][b]Rich Merchants - Less[/b]
Changes most merchants to have 2,000 gold instead of 750.[/list]

It works on existing games. You may have to wait for merchants to restock (Takes 2 days).

[b]Install into Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\[/b]
author: WheresMyPocket

files.name: Rich Merchants
files.changelogHtml: Fixed corrupted headers in all .esp files.

files.changelogHtml: Fixed corrupted headers in all .esp files.
